{{Wired embedded system |brand=Orange Pi |model=OPI PC |revision= |asin=B082H5BMF7, B018W6OTIM, |price=15 |est_release_date=08/2015 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |manuf=Shenzhen Xulong |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=4.0 |pwr_barrel_inner=1.7 |cpu1_brand=Allwinner |cpu1_model=H3 |cpu1_cspeed=1.3 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=0 |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B4G1646Q-HYK0 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, MicroSD Card slot |expansion_usb_num=3 |serial=yes,, 3-pin header,, (115200,8,N,1) |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |flags=HDMI out, camera in, microphone, IR receiver, GPIO |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux |default_user=root |default_pass=orangepi }} {{TagLine|Open-source Single-board Computer}} :[http://www.orangepi.org/orangepipc/ Product page]
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Allwinner]]'' H3 Quad-core ARM Cortex-A7 (H.265/HEVC 4K) *GPU: ''Mali-400MP2'' @600MHz (supports OpenGL ES 2.0) *Memory: 1GB (SDRAM) DDR3 (shared with GPU) *Onboard Storage: TF card (max. 64GB) / MMC card slot
{{WikiDevi.Wi-Cat.RU:Network/Orange Pi models}}
